itunes:title: Tyler Cameron and Hannah Brown Deserve a Better Mess
title: Tyler Cameron and Hannah Brown Deserve a Better Mess
description:
It’s a jam packed super-sode this week as Claire and Ashley dive into both Tyler Cameron and Hannah Brown’s Bachelor flip books. 

First, we’re looking at Hannah Brown’s God Bless this Mess where she reveals the highs and lows of pageant life, being The Bachelorette, and dating Tyler Cameron. Then, we read Tyler Cameron’s You Deserve Better. His love letter to love, consent, being an all around good guy, and dating Hannah Brown. Finally, Claire and Emma of Love to See It jump in to help us process what the hell Tyler is talking about. 


For an extended version of this extended episode join the Patreon where we’re dropping the full Claire and Emma convo plus a chat with Zachary Reality!

https://www.patreon.com/celebritymemoirbookclub 


Follow Claire and Emma on Instagram @claireandemmapod 


New merch just dropped!! Shop the celebrity worm, worms don’t rat, and more: https://celebritymemoirbookclub.square.site/


Meet us at Nicky’s Unisex in Williamsburg Thursday, December 9 at 8 pm for live comedy!!


Join the Facebook group to chat with the other worms! https://www.facebook.com/groups/cmbcwormhole


Follow us on Twitter @cmbc_podcast and Instagram @celebritymemoirbookclub 


Art by @adrianne_manpearl and theme song by @ashleesimpsonross


Support the show
